name: Super Bounce Ball Maze
description:
Super Bounce Ball Maze is a mix between old school platform and puzzle games.

But there is a catch: There is no jump button so you have to use your brain to solve each puzzle.

Controls are simple yet intuitive: push left to roll left, push right to roll right. Use jumps & obstacles to get the bouncy ball over the finish line in super sonic speed.

Do you have the brain and skills to beat all of the levels?

FEATURES

☆ 40 levels

☆ Endless mode

☆ Puzzle Platform Game

☆ Addictive & Smooth 2D Gameplay

☆ Physics

☆ Retro & old school style
